character.age: Late Teens to Early Twenties (Exact Age Unknown)
character.background: Eira was born in the secluded community of El'Goroth, located on the edge of the Dragon's Spine Mountains. In a family of elven parents, she received stealth and deception training from a young age. Her restlessness led her to venture beyond the borders of her community as a rogue and assassin, utilizing her natural talents to survive in a harsh world.
character.place-of-birth: El'Goroth, Edge of the Dragon's Spine Mountains

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown with Subtle Red Highlights
